Message:
“It’s just like you said, Lucille...
Humans can’t be trusted...!”

Nrgh... Where...?
How did I end up
on the shore...?
I should’ve sunk to
the bottom of the lake...

As I surveyed my surroundings,
I saw dark, murky bubbles
descending on the world.

Whatever the bubbles
touched began to melt...
It was like the end of the world...

Just then,
a bubble nearby popped,
and a voice rang
through my head.

Suddenly, the sight of Nebra’s
saddened expression
floated into my mind.

That’s right...
I never told her how I truly felt.

I simply assumed
she would understand,
even if I didn’t say it out loud...
I just...abandoned her...!

I should have told her
everything that was
running through my mind...!

I began walking towards
the place where
the bubbles were gathering...

to stand by that girl’s
side once more.

“Nebra...
My feelings haven’t changed.
The two of us are one.”
